Hepatitis B screening 
You	will	be	offered	hepatitis	
B screening as part of 
the Infectious Diseases in 
Pregnancy (IDPS) programme.
Hepatitis B is an infection 
caused by the hepatitis B 
virus. The infection mainly 
affects	the	liver,	but	is	present	
in	blood	and	body	fluids.
